newsitem.title: ISRAEL: At least one Palestinian dead in West Bank fighting.
newsitem.headline: At least one Palestinian dead in West Bank fighting.

text.p: Israeli troops shot dead at least one Palestinian on Wednesday in the bloodiest clashes in the West Bank since PLO rule began in 1994, witnesses said.

A Reuters cameraman filmed the dead body of a youth about 14 years old in hospital in the town of Ramallah, where Israeli troops and Palestinian police exchanged fire near a checkpoint on the border of the self-rule enclave.
Witnesses said as many as four Palestinians may have been killed in the clashes, in which at least 160 Arabs were wounded.
This report could not be immediately confirmed but doctors said at least six were critically wounded.
